QuestData.Title: Gutrek's Cleaver: The Second Piece
QuestData.Description:
The search for Gutrek's Cleaver continues. The journal reads:
"The hilt was to be buried in the marshlands, among the serpents whose poison claimed Gutrek's life. There's something here about covering it with a spiral stone, which is supposed to keep Gutrek's spirit at bay somehow."
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow the clue from the journal to find Gutrek's hilt.

Objectives.Objective: Follow the clue to find Gutrek's hilt
